name: Flicker of Azure
description:
So what if one day you were kicked out of your apartment, trying to cope you go to the nearest café and suddenly your whole view on the world gets shifted because you learn that... DEMONS EXIST?

You're taken under the wing of two demons, who are more than willing to teach you about their kind and what it's like to have to hide your true self from the public eye.

It's not going to be easy to adapt, but at least you don't have to do it alone. Would you burn yourself to bare your soul, or return to the walled but easy life you once had?

Flicker of Azure is a low fantasy visual novel with elements of romance, about how something so miniscule can shift ones perspective of the world completely.
Also, that it's rude to stare.

The current state of the game is a demo, which includes :

  • 5k words
  • Player character color customization
  • Animated sprites
  • A preview on what's to come

This game is currently in development and is being made by a sole developer, Pann.

This game initially was made during the NaNoRenO 2023 game jam, which is to create a visual novel over the course of a month. 

The game's demo at its current released state is lacking features due to the time constraints of the game jam, BUT there will be a full release.

Will be in the full release :

  • The rest of the story, including a chance to romance Wez (and if all goes well, perhaps other characters too...)
  • Redone and more backgrounds, with time-of-day variation
  • Music, as the demo only has a menu theme.
  • Completed custom UI
  • Various visual assets
  • The gallery
  • More CGs

The game's first full version release is aimed to be released at the end of mid 2023

Everything else (Art, Writing, Coding, Music, ect.) -> Pann
